fields.description:
h2. Request description
Customer needs to know the manufacturer of the device. 

The reason is for there are different behaviors depending on different manufacturers models.

In particular, there is a different behavior on Samsung devices while handling separators for phone numbers (', ' for Samsung, '; ' for all the others).
Model manufacturer is not always included in device Ti.Platform.Model

h2. Additional notes
Ticket link: http://support-admin.appcelerator.com/display/APP-978898
fields.summary: Android: user wants to get device Manufacturer
